question_text: Which of the following are true about NFC (Near Field Communication)? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: It requires close physical proximity to work
It can be used for point-of-sale payments
It supports data transfers over 10 meters
It is commonly used in smart card authentication
correct_answer: It requires close physical proximity to work
It can be used for point-of-sale payments
It is commonly used in smart card authentication
explanation: NFC is a short-range technology used for secure payments and proximity authentication. Its range is only a few centimeters.
